description.value: Contact information includes a person's telephone numbers en e-mail addresses.

purpose.value: This ContactPoint resource represents the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) ContactInformation v1.2(2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/ContactInformation-v1.2(2020EN)).

copyright.value: Copyright and related rights waived via CC0, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

comment.value:
Implementation of the "EmailAddresses" concept of zib ContactInformation.
To implement the entire zib, the complementary profile [zib-ContactInformation-TelephoneNumbers](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-ContactInformation-TelephoneNumbers) should be used. Both profiles can be added in a slice with the discriminator set to `profile`/`$this`.

description.value: Use ConceptMap NummerSoortCodelijst-to-ContactInformation-E-mailAddressesUse to translate terminology from the functional model to profile terminology in ValueSet ContactInformation-E-mailAddressesUse.
